lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about the helmet-to-helmet hit that injured Arizona Cardinals receiver Anquan Boldin in the game against the Jets misspelled the surname of the Cardinals’ team owner and his son. They are Bill and Mike Bidwill, not Bidwell. (Mike Bidwill was among those who went to the X-ray room at Giants Stadium to check on Boldin.).
snippet: An article on Monday about the helmet-to-helmet hit that injured Arizona Cardinals receiver Anquan Boldin in the game against the Jets misspelled the surname of the Cardinals’ team owner and his son. They are Bill and Mike Bidwill, not Bidwell....
